page.topic: PhoneGap - Secure Login with Location Tracking and Pushwoosh Notifications
page.description: This example demonstrates the using the Pushwoosh plugin for sending notifications.

section.description: This template can be used to create a PhoneGap application for iOS and Android devices that uses the Pushwoosh plugin for sending notifications. Refer to the [PhoneGap Push Notifications] documentation for more information about sending notifications in PhoneGap applications.

section.note: This template was tested with iOS 9.3.1 and Android 5.1.1.
